## Text Mining: Sentiment analysis and word clouds

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

### Install Packages

```
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "tidytext", "janeaustenr", "wordcloud2"))
```
### Process

1. Get data

1. Wrangle Data

1. Tokenize corpus

1. Generate word clouds

1. Join with sentiment dictionaries

1. Visualize sentiment
